posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t212/10727/3-bernard[/IMG]

Bernard - 3rd series - formerly in an SGC 30 holder - Flip shown, but I do not have it - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t212/10728/3-brackenridge[/IMG]

Brackenridge - 3rd series - formerly in an SGC 30 holder - Flip shown, but I do not have it - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t212/9496/2-bennett[/IMG]

Bennett - 2nd series - raw - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t212/9497/2-browning[/IMG]

Browning - 2nd series - raw - tougher back "Just Right" - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t212/9498/2-gurney[/IMG]

Gurney - 2nd series - raw - punch with four sharp corners - $OLD

All prices net to me include shipping.  Take them all for $92

Hi, Frank,

I'll take Brackenridge. Give me the payment info, please,.

Cheers,
Mike
